assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All procedures followed were in accordance with the ethical standards of the responsible committee on human experimentation (institutional and national) and with the Helsinki Declaration of 1975, as revised in 2000 (5). Verbal informed consent was obtained from all patients for being included in the study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study and all procedures were reviewed by the Mass General Brigham Institutional Review Board (Protocol #2020P003562), and were approved as an exempt protocol in December 2020.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent was obtained from all individual participants included in the study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: No non-human animal studies were carried out by the authors for this article.
